description: Indoor dining at restaurants is barred as part of new measures to curb the spread of the virus.
title: Coronavirus: Dublin brought under tighter Covid-19 restrictions
title_page: Coronavirus: Dublin brought under tighter Covid-19 restrictions - BBC News
maintext: The city and county is being moved from level two to level three of the country's five-level alert system. The government decides when to move between levels based on advice from the NPHET.
